zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军最高司令官及中国人民志愿军司令员一方与联合国军总司令另一方关于朝鲜军事停战的协定
en: Agreement Between the Commander-in-Chief, United Nations Command, on the One Hand, and the Supreme Commander of the Korean People’s Army and the Commander of the Chinese People’s Volunteers, on the Other Hand, Concerning a Military Armistice in Korea

description.zh-cn: 一份旨在停止朝鲜战争交战双方敌对军事行为的军事文件，于1953年7月27日在板门店签署。该协定建立了朝韩非军事区，并至今仍是维持朝鲜半岛停火状态的唯一法律依据。
description.en: A military document signed on July 27, 1953, in Panmunjom, aimed at ceasing hostile military actions between the belligerents of the Korean War. The agreement established the Korean Demilitarized Zone and remains the sole legal basis for maintaining the ceasefire on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 1950年至1953年间在朝鲜半岛爆发的一场战争，一方为朝鲜、中国，另一方为韩国、美国领导的联合国军。战争以《朝鲜停战协定》的签署而告终，但未签订和平条约。
description.en: A war fought on the Korean Peninsula from 1950 to 1953 between North Korea and China on one side, and South Korea and a United Nations force led by the United States on the other. The war ended with the signing of the Korean Armistice Agreement, but no peace treaty was signed.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和首任最高领导人。在朝鲜战争期间担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一。
description.en: Founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Served as the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army during the Korean War and was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，在朝鲜战争期间担任中国人民志愿军司令员，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who served as the Commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Korean War and was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军上将，在朝鲜战争后期担任联合国军总司令，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一。
description.en: A United States Army general who served as the Commander-in-Chief of the United Nations Command during the later stages of the Korean War and was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军大将，在朝鲜停战谈判中担任朝中代表团首席代表，并代表朝中方面在《朝鲜停战协定》上签字。
description.en: A general in the Korean People's Army who served as the chief delegate for the KPA/CPV delegation during the Korean armistice negotiations and signed the agreement on their behalf.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军中将，在朝鲜停战谈判中担任联合国军代表团首席代表，并代表联合国军在《朝鲜停战协定》上签字。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the United States Army who served as the chief delegate for the United Nations Command delegation during the Korean armistice negotiations and signed the agreement on its behalf.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量，是朝鲜战争的主要参战方和《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a main belligerent in the Korean War and a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争期间派遣的武装力量，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The armed forces dispatched by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War, and a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 根据联合国安理会决议成立，由美国领导的多国部队，在朝鲜战争中支援大韩民国。该司令部是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: A multinational military force established under a UN Security Council resolution and led by the United States to support South Korea during the Korean War. The command is a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的主要参战方之一。由于时任总统李承晚的反对，大韩民国并未签署《朝鲜停战协定》。
description.en: A main belligerent in the Korean War. Due to the opposition of then-President Syngman Rhee, the Republic of Korea did not sign the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国首任总统，因反对以三八线为界停战而拒绝在《朝鲜停战协定》上签字。
description.en: The first president of the Republic of Korea, who refused to sign the Korean Armistice Agreement due to his opposition to a ceasefire along the 38th parallel.

nodes.id: 联合国军事停战委员会

zh-cn: 联合国军事停战委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据《朝鲜停战协定》设立的机构，负责监督协定的实施。1994年，朝鲜人民军和中国人民志愿军代表团相继退出后，该委员会名存实亡。
description.en: An organization established by the Korean Armistice Agreement to supervise its implementation. It became defunct after the KPA and CPV delegations withdrew in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 根据《朝鲜停战协定》设立的缓冲区，横贯朝鲜半岛，将朝鲜民主主义人民共和国与大韩民国隔开。
description.en: A buffer zone established by the Korean Armistice Agreement that runs across the Korean Peninsula, separating the Democratic People's Republic of Korea from the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 位于朝韩非军事区内的共同警备区，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署地点。
description.en: The Joint Security Area within the Korean Demilitarized Zone, and the location where the Korean Armistice Agreement was signed.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的城市，朝鲜战争停战谈判初期的会谈地点。
description.en: A city in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, which was the location for the initial Korean War armistice talks.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的主要参战方，其军队是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: A main belligerent in the Korean War, whose army was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 派遣中国人民志愿军参与朝鲜战争，是停战谈判的重要一方。
description.en: Dispatched the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to participate in the Korean War and was a key party in the armistice negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中领导联合国军，是停战谈判和《朝鲜停战协定》的主要参与方。
description.en: Led the United Nations Command in the Korean War and was a principal party in the armistice negotiations and the resulting agreement.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的创建者和首任最高领导人。于1950年10月决定派兵入朝作战，组建中国人民志愿军。
description.en: Founder and first supreme leader of the People's Republic of China. Decided in October 1950 to send troops into Korea, forming the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的武装力量，是朝鲜战争的主要参战方，但未在《朝鲜停战协定》上签字。
description.en: The armed forces of the Republic of Korea, a main belligerent in the Korean War, but not a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安理会于1950年7月7日通过的决议，授权美国组建联合国军司令部以介入朝鲜战争。
description.en: A resolution passed by the UN Security Council on July 7, 1950, authorizing the United States to form the United Nations Command to intervene in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的主要机构之一，通过第84号决议授权组建了联合国军。
description.en: One of the principal organs of the United Nations, which authorized the formation of the United Nations Command through Resolution 84.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治家，曾在1954年担任外长期间声称大韩民国不再受《朝鲜停战协定》约束。
description.en: A South Korean politician who, as foreign minister in 1954, stated that the Republic of Korea was no longer bound by the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 美国的陆上军事分支，在朝鲜战争中是联合国军的核心力量。
description.en: The land service branch of the United States Armed Forces, which formed the core of the United Nations Command during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 2018年由韩国总统文在寅和朝鲜国务委员会委员长金正恩签署的共同宣言，旨在改善朝韩关系并致力于建立永久和平机制，以取代《朝鲜停战协定》。
description.en: A joint declaration signed in 2018 by South Korean President Moon Jae-in and North Korean Chairman Kim Jong-un, aiming to improve inter-Korean relations and work towards a permanent peace regime to replace the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国第19任总统，于2018年与金正恩共同签署了《板门店宣言》。
description.en: The 19th President of the Republic of Korea, who co-signed the Panmunjom Declaration with Kim Jong-un in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国第三代最高领导人，于2018年与文在寅共同签署了《板门店宣言》。
description.en: The third supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, who co-signed the Panmunjom Declaration with Moon Jae-in in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 《朝鲜停战协定》的签署标志着朝鲜战争中敌对军事行为的完全停止，使战争进入停火状态。
description.en: The signing of the Korean Armistice Agreement marked the complete cessation of hostile military actions in the Korean War, bringing the conflict to a ceasefire.

description.zh-cn: 作为朝鲜人民军最高司令官，金日成是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一。
description.en: As the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army, Kim Il-sung was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国人民志愿军司令员，彭德怀是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一。
description.en: As the Commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, Peng Dehuai was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 作为联合国军总司令，马克·克拉克是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一。
description.en: As the Commander-in-Chief of the United Nations Command, Mark W. Clark was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The Korean People's Army was one of the signatory parties to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army was one of the signatory parties to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 联合国军是《朝鲜停戦协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The United Nations Command was one of the signatory parties to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 时任大韩民国总统李承晚反对停战，因此大韩民国未在协定上签字。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of Korea, Syngman Rhee, opposed the armistice, and therefore South Korea did not sign the agreement.

description.zh-cn: 由于时任总统李承晚的反对，大韩民国未在《朝鲜停战协定》上签字。
description.en: Due to the opposition of then-President Syngman Rhee, the Republic of Korea did not sign the Korean Armistice Agreement.

relationships.target: 联合国军事停战委员会

description.zh-cn: 《朝鲜停战协定》规定设立军事停战委员会，以监督协定的实施。
description.en: The Korean Armistice Agreement stipulated the establishment of the Military Armistice Commission to supervise the implementation of the agreement.

description.zh-cn: 《朝鲜停战协定》的主要内容之一是建立一条军事分界线和非军事区作为缓冲区。
description.en: One of the main provisions of the Korean Armistice Agreement was the establishment of a military demarcation line and a demilitarized zone as a buffer.

relationships.target: 联合国军事停战委员会

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军决定停止参加停战委员会活动，并宣布不再承认停战委员会联合国军司令部部分为对应机构，导致该委员会名存实亡。
description.en: The Korean People's Army decided to cease its participation in the Military Armistice Commission and no longer recognized the UNC component as its counterpart, rendering the commission defunct.

relationships.target: 联合国军事停战委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国政府宣布召回驻板门店停战委员会的中国人民志愿军代表团。
description.en: The Chinese government announced the recall of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army delegation from the Military Armistice Commission in Panmunjom.

relationships.source: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 为应对韩国加入“防扩散安全倡议”，朝鲜宣布退出停战协定，不再受其约束。2013年3月5日，朝鲜人民军最高司令部再次声明不承认该协定。
description.en: In response to South Korea joining the Proliferation Security Initiative, North Korea announced its withdrawal from the armistice agreement, stating it would no longer be bound by it. On March 5, 2013, the KPA Supreme Command reiterated that it would not recognize the agreement.

description.zh-cn: 1954年日内瓦会议和谈破裂后，时任大韩民国外交部长官卞荣泰称大韩民国“不再认为有义务遵守停战协定”。
description.en: After the breakdown of the Geneva Conference talks in 1954, then-South Korean Foreign Minister Pyon Yong-tae stated that the Republic of Korea 'no longer considers itself obligated to abide by the armistice agreement'.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在朝鲜战争期间担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官。
description.en: Kim Il-sung served as the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀在朝鲜战争期间担任中国人民志愿军司令员。
description.en: Peng Dehuai served as the Commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 马克·克拉克在朝鲜战争后期担任联合国军总司令。
description.en: Mark W. Clark served as the Commander-in-Chief of the United Nations Command during the later stages of the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 时任中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会主席毛泽东命令东北边防军组成中国人民志愿军入朝作战。
description.en: Mao Zedong, then-Chairman of the Central People's Revolutionary Military Commission, ordered the formation of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army from the Northeast Border Defense Army to enter Korea.

description.zh-cn: 该决议授权美国组建联合国军司令部以介入朝鲜战争。
description.en: This resolution authorized the United States to form the United Nations Command to intervene in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安理会通过了第84号决议。
description.en: The United Nations Security Council passed Resolution 84.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中，朝鲜人民军与中国人民志愿军是并肩作战的盟友。
description.en: During the Korean War, the Korean People's Army and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army were allies fighting side by side.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中，朝鲜人民军与联合国军是敌对的交战方。
description.en: During the Korean War, the Korean People's Army and the United Nations Command were opposing belligerents.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中，中国人民志愿军与联合国军是敌对的交战方。
description.en: During the Korean War, the Chinese People's Volunteer Army and the United Nations Command were opposing belligerents.

relationships.source: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国与大韩民国是朝鲜战争的主要交战国，停战后双方在法理上仍处于战争状态。
description.en: The Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Republic of Korea were the main belligerent states in the Korean War. After the armistice, they technically remain in a state of war.

description.zh-cn: 时任韩国总统文在寅与朝鲜领导人金正恩共同签署了《板门店宣言》。
description.en: Then-South Korean President Moon Jae-in co-signed the Panmunjom Declaration with North Korean leader Kim Jong-un.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜国务委员会委员长金正恩与韩国总统文在寅共同签署了《板门店宣言》。
description.en: Chairman of the State Affairs Commission Kim Jong-un co-signed the Panmunjom Declaration with South Korean President Moon Jae-in.

description.zh-cn: 《板门店宣言》旨在通过达成永久和平协议来正式结束朝鲜战争，从而取代《朝鲜停战协定》。
description.en: The Panmunjom Declaration aimed to formally end the Korean War by reaching a permanent peace agreement, thereby replacing the Korean Armistice Agreement.
